title: Single slit - slit width for 400 nm laser beam

content.question: The figure shows a portion of a diffraction pattern formed on a screen by a laser beam that has passed through a narrow vertical slit. The wavelength of the laser is <math alttext="400 nanometers" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>400</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>nm</mtext></math>, the screen is a distance of <math alttext="3.0 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></math> from the slit, and the distance between the two dark fringes indicated in the figure is <math alttext="0.10 meter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></math>. What is the width of the slit?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
